phrases: Original Translation by Triad/ Softsub by Urusai
You may not believe me, but...
Usotsuki na anata nakimushi no atashi
Oshare shita kami mo rain suton no tsume mo
Anata wa kidzuki mo shinai ne
Love kanashii namida nanka ja nai yo
Me ga kawaite hirihiri suru dake
Kimi dake wo atashi dake wo
Kawaikunai nakigao mo se mo aishiteru
Why cannot things go well between
the liar, you, and the crybaby, me?
You do not notice my styled hair
or my nice set of press-on nails.
Love is not about the unhappy tears that go along with it.
Those tears only leave my eyes dry and hurt me.
between only you and only me.
I want to accept your hot feelings
and be taken by you forever.
Despite your uncute, tearful face and your shortness, I still love you.
This is my second day of high school.
It would be nice if I could make lots of friends.
F-For now, I will try to...
YOU-Umm, what middle school are you from?
Ah... we have to change classrooms for home ec, right?
Can I go with you guys?
Ah, you were in the first seat in the front, right?
What middle school are you from?
There do not seem to be any girls in our class from Asahi, huh?
Ah, this girl Yamamoto-san who sits next to me is from Asahi Middle School.
You must have heard a lot about him.
We were with Motoharu during the winter session, and he is just so cool!
He was popular with both the girls and guys.
They even say that in his last year of middle school...
So someone like that is in the same class as me...
Ah, hey, you are from the same middle school as Yano-kun, right?
I heard two-thirds of the girls fell for him?
Hey, Nana, want to be on the class committee?
Ah... I prefer an easy life, so...
I really want to be with Motoharu on the committee...
What is the procedure for joining it?
Though announcing it by yourself is kind of lame...
Er... what was her name again...?
I will be counting on you!
YOU-Umm, what was that girl's name again...?
You may not believe me, but...
Do not you think this nomination's a little arbitrary?
But nobody nominated anyone else or nominated themselves, so...
I nominate myself as vice president.
There you go, taking the easy way out again...
Ah... umm, I would also like to nominate someone...
So in the end, I ended up as class president...
I will assign everyone is duties and decide the class goals, then.
That was pretty rude of you.
You lied to me before, did not you?
Ahh... was I more rude than forgetting someone is name?
This guy is kind of annoying...
But is not it really my fault for forgetting her name...?
Hey, I wonder if Yano-kun's had a girlfriend before...
I have heard he is gone out with a lot of different girls...
It seems like I am a part of the other third of the class...
Do not ask me about him.
She said she did not know...
Nana, did you finish your career counseling session?
Umm... I did not understand it very much...
I wonder if I should have joined a club, too...
How long did your career counseling session last?
No, it took half an hour.
Seriously, it took only five minutes.
I do not want to hear that from you.
This is not my heart beating faster for him... he only surprised me.
I just did not think he would call out to me like that.
That is why... that is why...
You plan on using math down you career path?
N-No, I plan to go to a liberal arts private school...
Then why bother worrying about the sciences?
Do not you think it would be wiser to use this time focusing on liberal arts instead?
But... when you are so bad at something, then...
Even if you are bad at it, nothing will come from it.
It will not help you at all.
I do not understand why people do useless things they do not even like.
I heard the week after next is a school trip?
But we have tests before that...
I do not know what I am going to do.
I have not studied at all.
To be a piece of cake for you, Nana?
No way, I have practically given up.
I will probably get a zero or something in math.
Amazing... I actually got a zero...
We should probably decide who is in charge of the trip soon...
Ah... the people to head the teams, yeah...
And about buying stuff for the trip...
It is a pain, so can you go with the girls to take care of it?
I can see that, you know.
I just was not feeling well, so...
I would like you and the girls to take care of the shopping...
Why do we always get the annoying stuff?
Do not be tricked, do not be tricked.
Even if he smiled like that, it is just because he threatened to blurt out your math grade...
You cannot go on to the next grade with a failing mark...
But Yamamoto-san, did not you say to drop math if I was aiming for liberal arts school?
But a failing grade is no good, obviously.
How should I put this... there are times when you begin to hate everything around you.
W-What is up with my heart thumping like that?!
Ah... I wanted to look at the sky, so...
But anyway, do you really think it is worth worrying about?
Is not it all right if you just try your best at that?
And besides, do not you think getting a zero's pretty impressive in another way?
Yano, is there anything you are not good at?
I am too popular with the girls.
Besides that, do you have trouble with anything else?
I stand out, so I am always being watched.
And even though it is annoying, I normally get picked to be on the class committee.
Hey... none of those are problems.
And when you say fickle, do you really have the right to talk that way about others?
Are you making fun of me?
Despite my looks, I am pretty single-minded.
Do not I seem that way?
I wonder what kind of girls Yano falls for...
I wonder what kind of girls he is fallen for...
Hey.. if the girl you were going out with was fickle, what would you do?
I wonder why I want to know his answer...
I am not sure why I asked...
Yano, if you have any problems, I will lend an ear.
You just listened to me go on, so...
I do not have any problems.
I do not believe this is happening...
This is definitely going to be the worst mistake of my life...
That is a right reserved for the living, do not you think?
I did not know what Yano meant when he said that.
Take note of these important points during our walkathon school trip.
We will travel by bus to the starting point.
The entire length is 42 km, and... hey, Yano!
Explain this important stuff to everyone!
The use of cell phones is prohibited.
And no shopping at any shops along the path!
I feel so pathetic, falling for someone incredibly irresponsible like him...
I am going to collect everyone is cell phones now!
Does he really not have one...?
I am telling you, I forgot to bring it.
Yano really does not have one with him?
Ah, it is so nice out!
I wonder if we will be able to make it the whole 42 km...
Hey... I sure want to eat lunch with Yano...
Nana, talk to him for us!
Well, you have a relationship with him since you are prez and he is vice prez.
Ah... I guess I have no choice, huh?
W-Want to have lunch together, Yamamoto-san?
What are you doing, inviting Yamamoto-san...?
You do not want to eat with Yamamoto-san?
Well, it is not that we do not want to, she is just hard to talk to.
She gives off a dark aura...
Well, it is just fine and all... but be sure to invite Yano and the others, too.
Oh no, what am I going to do?
If I invite Yano now, it will be like I did it to harass Yamamoto-san...
Even though almost nobody hates him, I wonder why Yamamoto-san does...
Apparently, they were both in same class in middle school.
Even now, they still seem to hang out a lot.
It is the half way point!
Think you will be able to walk the whole 42 km?
Ah, sure, but... can you keep up with our pace?
Ah... I am starting to get tired...
The scenery is not changing a bit, either...
I am starting to get bored of nature.
We should have retired at the 20 km mark...
Hey... want to sit down for lunch now?
In the end, we lost track of Yano and the others, anyway...
Do you think the teachers will pass by in their cars?
Ah... I think they are eating lunch at the cabin back at the 20 km halfway point...
They should be by in an hour or two.
For now, if I find someone who can get in touch with them, I will let them know.
Yamamoto-san, can you eat some fruit?
I brought some cold juice with me...
What are we going to do?
I wonder if she will get better if she takes a break...
I wonder if we have to wait for the teachers...
I am the one who is supposed to be responsible, but I cannot do anything to help...
Someone is heading back this way.
Take got in touch with me.
Do you have any symptoms of dehydration?
Did you try licking some salt?
We should get someone with a car to come over here.
But how will we contact the teachers?
How long before you reach the goal?
The teachers have not passed by yet, right?
This guy... he kept it hidden...
I am going to return to the halfway point.
They are eating lunch in the barbecue house at the lodge back there.
If I go now to get them, they can be back here in five minutes if they drive.
Hey, do any of you have your cell phones with you?
None of us... they were taken away.
Why cannot you girls keep control of your own cell phones?
I have mine... so we will be fine...
Ah, I will come with you.
But I am pretty much the responsible party here, so...
If you start slowing me down, I will leave you behind.
Your number has not changed, right?
They know each other's cell phone numbers because they were in the same class in middle school, right?
Why are you walking like a snail?
I will seriously leave you behind.
Ah... I am such a bad person... worrying about something else when Yamamoto-san is like that...
Hey, were you close to Yamamoto-san in middle school?
She is been pretty quiet since a long time ago.
So she is been like that since long ago...
What do you mean, like that?
Well, she does not really express her feelings...
I wonder if she is a single child?
Is not it better that way?
She seems like the type who would hate being pitied.
Yano... did you go to the funeral?
It was summer vacation, after all
I have... never experienced anything like that, so I do not really understand, but...
It must be really difficult, huh?
I am... really an unsympathetic girl...
Even though we are having this discussion, my heart's beating really fast because of Yano...
It looks like she came down with a fever.
Then, Sensei, I am counting on you.
I have not had any beer, so I should be fine.
H-Hey, should not we go with him?
There is nothing more we can do, right?
Let us just leave the rest to him.
Two plates of beef ribs and two Oolong teas, please!
They say one should be efficient in life, right?
Ah... and some cow tongue and barbecued beef giblets too, please.
It really helped that you were here...
I have never seen someone with as carefree a smile as his...
Yamamoto-san was taken home by the teacher.
Looks like it was just the common cold.
Umm... buses will be leaving from all over, so please make sure you board the right one.
Even though we just parted from each other...
I want to see him again...
Ah, how did things turn out?
Well, we got a teacher to come by in a car and take her home.
I was just thinking you were all so great, thinking on behalf of your friends.
Yeah... if it were me, I would not be able to get back up...
No one close to me has died yet, so I do not really get it, but I wonder how it must feel...
I wonder if a person would just put a stopper on their life...
Though, I feel like they are a different type of person...
Yeah... but you cannot just tell from their outward appearance, so...
But, really... it is kind of bad...
I have never seen them cry before... and I think it would be better if they would just cry or let it distract them...
But I have no idea if they are over it, or if they are still saddened about it...
You do not have to talk about them like that!
I think they are really strong.
I think it is okay not to keep it all bottled up sometimes.
It can be really frustrating because you are friends, do not you think?
Takeuchi-kun, you are really that close...?
Even though we are in different classes, we are still friends, right?
I want to peel it all off...
Is that something you normally say to a girl?
How about that is quite a face.
He is so shameless, stuck-up, irresponsible, and impossible to deal with, but...
I love him a whole lot...
Taisetsu na anata no hitomi ni
Watashi wa utsutteru no ka na
Waraitai waraitai kokoro no mannaka de
dou demo ii koto mo zenbu
Ude wo kunde aruite ikou YEAH!
Taisetsu na hito tsurete yukun da ne
Kimi wo sagashite kimi wo sagashite
Donna toki demo kimi wo sagashiteiru kedo
Mitsukaru no sore wa kimi na no?
Dore dake no omoi nara dakishimete kureru no?
Kinou no hanashi ashita no hanashi
Futari no mirai kakaekirenai hodo zenbu
I wonder if I am reflected
I wonder how I can always be happy
on the windowsill where the sunshine always falls?
I hide my true feelings and the thumping of my heart.
the pain of being able to understand each other burns.
I want to smile, I want to smile, down to the core of my heart.
I will open up to you
about how I pretend to be strong, about how I am weak,
I will continue to love you forever.
Take my arm and let us walk.
The seasons leave only me behind
and take my precious person away, do not they?
I look for you, I look for you,
I am always looking for you,
but when I find that person, is it really you?
I am so sad, I am so sad,
How much feeling must I give to be able to embrace you?
Ah, I want to smile, I want to smile.
I will open up to you.
about our future and everything, so much that I cannot even take it all myself.
You do not have to promise me anything.
I think I might like you...
I am asking if you really, really like me.
She was with another guy when she died.
They were never through with one another...
